description:
Now wait a minute...⠀
⠀
So, COVID-19 comes along & now we need a vaccine, & now there’s going to be a meat shortage too?⠀
⠀
& Gates just 𝙝𝙖𝙥𝙥𝙚𝙣𝙨 to come to the rescue with a vaccine & artificial meat?⠀
⠀
& prior to any of this, Gates funds a simulation (event 201 - google it) about this ｖｅｒｙ scenario (a global pandemic created by a new SARS-like coronavirus) a month 𝙗𝙚𝙛𝙤𝙧𝙚 it actually happens?⠀
⠀
& Fauci funded $7.4 million in gain-of-function research to the Wuhan lab for the express purpose of generating a viral mutant capable of crossing over from bats to humans just so that they could be ready if it happened someday? After a moratorium was placed & then subsequently lifted for this type of research?⠀
⠀
& right when Phase II of this funded program kicks off in 2019, this very virus that they’re attempting to genetically create in the lab in Wuhan suddenly shows up in the population... ⠀
𝗶𝗻 𝗪𝘂𝗵𝗮𝗻?⠀
⠀
& Fauci is also a lead council member of the Gates Foundation Global Vaccine Action Plan?⠀
⠀
Well... if you weren’t a conspiracy theorist before all this, I bet you are now. We ain’t the ones lookin so crazy anymore, are we?⠀
⠀
(Feel free to fact check me, oh Instagram Fact Checker gods)⠀
⠀
#gates #fauci #wuhan #covid #shillgates #billgates #drfauci #dontbelievethehype #factchecked #quarantine #event201 #wokeaf #freedomkeeper #truthseeker #hopedealer #advocatelikeamother #conspiracytheory #conspiracytheories #conspiracy
